description: TV=Tablet PCThis amazing android tv box support online video(IPTV/OTT TV),three big mainstream HD formats and all multimedia player of android system.Also this cute set-top box can support online office,game,QQ,MSN. What is the Best Amazing is here:it can make your TV to be a Android 4.2 PC or Android 4.2 Tablet by connecting the wireless mouse and wireless keyboard,then you can surf the Internet to read all kinds of news,online office,video/voice chat, email..Come one,upgrade your digital hall immediately,then you and your family just need to sitting on the sofa comfortable,experience the HD video,games,video and voice chatWhat is is MX TV BoxThe MX brings high performance HD streaming from the internet and local media to your TV.The powerful dual core MX processor with the Mali-400 3D graphics accelerator can support 3D gaming.It supports online video,three mainstream HD formats and under full application of multimedia player of android systemCompatible with multiple types of video files and audio formatsWe can play the avi、mpg、vob、rmvb、mkv、m2ts、ts video files by the tv box.Also it can support MP3、WMA、AC3、DTS、ACC and various audio formatsSupport USB/SD/MMC/SDHC cardYou only need to plug your u disk and mobile hard disk in the TV box,then you can watch your favorite TV or movies in the USB drive and hard disk. Also, it has one HDMI port and one AV portSpecifications*Storage External: Support SD Card up to 32GB*WiFi: WiFi 802.11b/g/n*Office: Support MS Office Word, PPT, Excel, PDF etc*Email: Gmail, POP3/SMTP/IMAP4Package included1 x MX Android TV Box1 x 8GB SD Card1 x AC Charger Adapter1 x HDMI cable (1.5M)1 x AV cable (1.2M)1 x User Manual1 x Romote Control
title: DBPOWER MX Dual Core Android 4.2,1920x1080P HD Video Model,Smart Set-top Box,Android Tv Box, XBMC Mini PC,Wifi(WiFi 802.11b/g/n)/3D,With 8GB SD Card + Romote Control+HDMI Cable+AV Cable
